import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import '../Style/Home.scss'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default () => { const navRef = useRef(); const aboutRef = useRef(); const workRef = useRef(); const contactRef = useRef(); const [ backgroundColor, setBackgroundColor ] = useState('#f7f3f0'); const [ navPosition, setNavPosition ] = useState(false); const [ navAboutActive, setNavAboutActive ] = useState(''); const [ navWorkActive, setNavWorkActive ] = useState(''); const [ navContactActive, setNavContactActive ] = useState(''); const [ aboutAni, setAboutAni ] = useState(''); // const [ workAni, setWorkAni ] = useState(''); // const [ contactAni, setContactAni ] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setAboutAni('--active'); }, 10); window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { handleNavPosition(); handleNavEffect(); }); }, []) const handleNavPosition = () => { if(window.pageYOffset > navRef.current.offsetTop * 1.9) { setNavPosition(false); }else { setNavPosition(-window.pageYOffset * .5); } } //다른 방법 생각해보기 const handleNavEffect = () => { if(window.pageYOffset > contactRef.current.offsetTop * 0.9){ setNavContactActive('--active'); setNavWorkActive(''); setNavAboutActive(''); }else if(window.pageYOffset > workRef.current.offsetTop * 0.9){ setNavContactActive(''); setNavWorkActive('--active'); setNavAboutActive(''); }else if(window.pageYOffset > aboutRef.current.offsetTop){ setNavContactActive(''); setNavWorkActive(''); setNavAboutActive('--active'); } } return (
